response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This remarkable item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. Given its importance and the unique features it offers, we are extending an offer to sell it to you for $950,000. We are confident this price reflects the true worth of the product while providing you with an exceptional opportunity. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 950000}
